controller

Interface IController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Controller

    public interface IController
    Classes with this interface can check and do all the action that a user want.

      • getFigureGetter

        static java.util.function.Function<Point,IFigure> getFigureGetter(MoveInPointFigurePairs afterThisMove,
                                                                  IGameField gameField)
        Create a figure out of the given game field and the move. It used first the position of the given move. When it is not in it, it use the position of the game field.
        Parameters:
        afterThisMove - The move which should use
        gameField - The game field which should be use
        Returns:
        A figureGetter where you can get a figure for a given position
